description:
Ive been saying since the beginning that this drug has been around since the 60s and they have been using it to treat ailments with no adverse side effects for years , these are proven facts.  So much so that dr fauci himself approved the drug three years ago but then turned around and said it was dangerous. 
Why? Becuase he did not have a stake in the drug like he did respridol,  which actually does have adverse side effects.  Here are some things I've heard the sheep say about this drug [HCQ] . 

""Its never been tested"" 
Untrue its been around for the past 60 years .

""It could kill you ""
Also unsure no studies prove this and the studies that show adverse effects are from a different drug entirely 

""It has no effect""
It has been proven as a treatment of not only malaria but also cancer and other serious ailments 

""Its not approved by the FDA""
UNTRUE ITS BEEN APPROVED BY THE FDA FOR MANY YEARS .

Noone needed to die . We have been betrayed once again by people who were put in power to have OUR best interest in mind . Not their own financial and personal interests. 
.
.
.
